inn1.comm: too short and wide and it swings away further, starts with a wide
back of length outside off, Finch shoulders arms and there's good very carry for the keeper
angled in this time towards the pads, deflects it off the pad towards fine leg for one
fullish on the leg stump, tucked straight to midwicket
short this time and swinging away from the off stump, Warner sways out of the line
down the leg side now for the second wide of the over
back of length and coming into Warner, no room for him as he crouches a bit awkwardly after taking it on the body
straighter on the stumps, Warner defends it back
angled into the batsman from length, clipped to midwicket
swinging away from length outside off, left alone
too full on the pads and that's been beautifully clipped off the pads by leaning towards it for four between midwicket and mid on
slower at 126.7kph and back of length outside off, pushed down to mid-off
132kph, nice outswing from length outside off, wide enough for Finch to leave it
goes down the leg side now for a wide
straightish outside the off stump, Finch stretches out and defends it
what bounce! 142 kph down the leg side from back of length, that took off like a plane and QDK managed to stop it
fuller on the pads this time, tucked between midwicket and mid on in the gap. The throw hits Finch as he comes back for the second
goes on the back foot and defends the ball that swings away from around off stump
bangs it in on back of length around off, Warner hops back and defends again
down leg again, that's the fourth wide from Morkel
back to the off stump on length, Warner leans forward a bit and defends towards cover
slightly full outside off with the angle, pushed tentatively to cover
fuller and wider, he swings his arms to send it crashing between point and cover point with a drive for four!
slightly short of length outside the off stump, Finch defends it back
closer to the off stump now, Finch goes back again to defend it
131kph, towards off stump, Finch leans forward and pushes it down to mid on
angled in this time, Finch wants to tuck it on leg but doesn't connect. That's a no ball for overstepping
makes room, Philander relies by pitching it outside off with outswing and Finch has to stretch a lot to loft it over the covers
goes on the back foot for the back of length delivery that's coming in and tucks it on the leg side for one
smacked! It was fullish outside off, in Warner's arc and he absolutely smashed it down the ground to the long-on boundary for a massive six!
starts with one outside off on length, Finch defends it back
138.3kph, right on the off stump on length again, Finch defends off the back foot
towards the pads and it's tucked to deep square leg for one
he gets room, that's not too full but Warner waits for it and swishes at it late to beat point and he gets four more
slower at 121kph outside off, looked like an offcutter, and Warner stretched out to push it to cover
nearly drags it on to the stumps! It was angled away from Warner, he cut the ball off the back foot and the inside edge nearly crashed into the stumps
back of length around off, pushed down to mid on
touch shorter towards off and middle, inside edge thuds onto the pads
fullish outside off with outswing, driven to cover point off the front foot
straighter delivery on middle stumps, Finch pushes to mid on with the full face of the bat
shorter and coming in, Finch took a step down to tuck it to leg but got another inside edge on the thigh pad
short ball, pulled, there's a deep square leg but Finch has sent it all the way for six! Finch picked the length early and made sure he middled it to turn the fielder into a spectator
on length and outside off, cuts it late to backward point
slightly slower on length outside off, Warner defends it
back of length outside off, good bounce and Warner has to go back to defend it to short cover point
crashed through the off side, absolutely smacked! Too short and wide with the angle, he punched it past cover for a cracking four
slightly fuller but still too wide, smacks it straight to cover this time
short delivery on the off stump, Warner goes on his toes to defend it on off
good length from Philander, pitching just outside off and angling in, Finch presses forward and defends on the off side
Finch backs away towards leg to make room to try and blast through the off side, but Philander's length is too tight, he ends up mis-hitting it back to the bowler
stays in his crease and moves a touch across his stumps this time to play the ball on the leg side
Finch once again moves back and across to tuck the ball from middle stump to midwicket, Philander's given him nothing to work with in terms of line and length so far in this over
good length and straight, Finch stays back and punches with a straight bat between the stumps at the bowler's end and the non-striker, mid-on runs to his left to field
a slower ball to finish a superb over, Warner blocks it
a bit too full on middle and leg, Finch leans across and flicks through square to turn the strike over
Warner gets down low to drive on the off side but can't beat cover
short of a length angling across the left-hander, Warner stays back and flat-bats it towards cover where Rossouw dives to his left and deflects the ball towards mid-off to save runs
short of a length and into the hips, Finch moves across and tucks the ball through square leg
the bouncer, and Warner ducks under it, slightly leg stump-ish that was
dug in short again but this time it doesn't bounce that high, Warner gets on tippy-toe and pulls the ball down through square leg

Warner gave Morkel the charge, Morkel countered by pitching short and aiming for the body, cramping Warner for room, Warner hurriedly tried to defend and ended up playing it awkwardly towards Amla at short cover, where the ball bounced just short of the catcher
defended on the off side
imperious from Finch, comes forward, picks up the length ball and simply lofts cleanly through the line, sending the ball soaring over mid-off with a full swing of the bat
a better length around off stump from Morkel, Finch stays in his crease and blocks
played with soft hands off the front foot towards point
good length angling into the right-hander, Finch moves across and dabs the ball in front of square leg and calls Warner through for a fast single
played off the front foot towards midwicket
good length on off, the bowler dives to his left to stop Finch's drive
Finch backs away far outside leg to try and hit on the off side, Behardien cramps him for room and the result is an inside edge that goes past leg stump and the keeper
driven to long off for a single
he's bowling a mix of slower balls, Warner plays this one back to Behardien
stays in his crease and defends on the off side, tight length from Behardien on off stump

run out chance at the bowler's end! Finch tapped the ball on the off side with a bottom edge, QDK ran towards the slip region to collect the ball and threw it at the bowler's end, direct hit would have sent Warner back because he had come down a long way for the single he wanted
outside off on length, pushed straight to point
141kph, beauty! That one angled in from just outside off on back of length, Finch looked to defend but the ball held its line a bit and just missed the outside edge
towards the pads now, it's tucked towards short fine leg for a quick single and an overthrow at the bowler's end gets them another
back of length outside off, taps it late towards third man

attempts a slog and takes a blow on the body! Warner stopped low a bit for the back of length delivery from leg stump but he failed to connect and an edge went on to hit him on the back of his head under the helmet
short of length and angled towards leg, Finch guides it fine down the leg side for a delicate four
slightly straighter, Finch drives on the off side but the edge goes back to the bowler
outside off on length, guides it late but to point
fuller outside the off stump, drives fiercely off the front foot and straight to cover
well outside off again, Finch cuts it late to beat short third man but Morkel dives to his right to save a few runs
offcutter from off stump and going away, pushed off the back foot to cover
138.7kph, pushes the length delivery towards mid-off, the fielder dives to get a hand to it and deflects it and they sneak in a run
slower at 129kph, on the pads and it's clipped to midwicket
126.5kph, it's a bouncer towards off stump, Warner waits and pulls it towards deep backward square leg for two
back f length towards middle from leg, 138kph and Warner goes back to defend it to cover
makes room for the back of length delivery, not much room as he defends ton off and it's a no ball for overstepping
short ball on the leg side, Warner pulls it off the toe of the bat and it just clears midwicket, gets two
that's high in the air, has he timed it well enough, he has and it's gone for six! Fullish outside the off stump, he got under it and lofted it over long off for six
slightly full on middle, driven down the ground to long on
pushes the offcutting delivery from outside off to deep cover
brings it in a bit from outside off, Finch taps it towards point
angled in towards middle and leg now, flicked past midwicket for one
shorter delivery on the pads, tucked away to deep backward square leg
full on the pads now, driven straight to midwicket this time
on length outside off, Finch shuffles across a bit and turns it towards short midwicket, the fielder throws it at the keeper's end but Finch is back in time
length delivery outside off, pushed off the back foot towards cover
too short, that's another six from Finch! He spotted the short ball outside off, rocked back and smacked it with a pull over deep square leg
full and outside off, driven firmly in the air and it falls short of cover
back of length outside off, pulled to midwicket and that's another no ball
moves across the stumps, and the full delivery well outside off is smacked down the ground over mid on for a four
on length outside off, he leans forward to defend this time. And that's drinks
length delivery outside off, Warner sweeps it to fine leg for two
edges in the air, but it's far from short third man! Looked like a googly outside off, Warner slogged and got a thick edge
full outside off again, not a googly and Warner smacks it over the covers for four this time
fuller on middle and leg, pushed down towards long on with soft hands and they get two
quicker one outside off, pushed back to the bowler
he goes down on a knee and sweeps the length delivery from outside off in the air to the fine leg region for four. That's the 100 for Australia
shapes it away a bit from outside off, Finch drives it to cover
on length and closer to off, pushed down the ground to long on
makes some room and drives the full delivery from middle down to long off
shorter outside off, Finch pushes it to cover where AB misfields a bit and it's not too far from him, but they come back for the second as well
shorter outside off, swishes it to point
well outside off again and that's driven through the covers for one, fifty for Finch
brings it in towards middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
fuller towards the pads and it's glanced fine down the leg side off the bat for four more
back of length on middle stump, Finch defends it back
shorter and wider outside off, punched to cover
full and well outside off, driven off the front foot to cover
slower at 107kph, full on middle stump and driven down to long on
outside off on length, pushed into the covers
shapes it away a bit from outside off, tapped a bit wide of backward point for one
low full toss outside off, pushes it back to the bowler
too short and wide, it's slow at 113.5kph, Warner waits for it by going on the back foot and crashes it between point and cover point for four, that's his fifty
close to the off stump on length, pushed off the front foot towards cover
taken at midwicket! It was a length delivery on middle and off, Warner slogged it without much footwork and AB at midwicket had to jump a bit to take the flat catch
angled into the batsman, Finch clips it to short fine leg
angled into the batsman with a full delivery, flicked in the air over midwicket
142kph, on length outside off, he defends off the back foot to point
fullish delivery outside off, driven firmly down the ground but Steyn stops it
slides it down the leg side for a wide
cuts it in from just outside off, inside edge off the drive goes to midwicket
on length and cutting in again, he defends on the leg side
that's too full and Finch lofts it with such ease to the wide long on boundary for a one-bounce four
shorter outside off, pushed back to the bowler
shapes it away a bit from outside off, he pushes it off the front foot on the off side
short of length outside off, Finch swats it down to long on for one
straighter delivery on off stump, pushed down the ground to long off
brings the ball in from short of length, helped to fine leg for one
cutting in again towards the batsman, tucked to midwicket
outside off now on back of length, pushed off the back foot into the covers
stretches forward and drives the length delivery into the covers. Slightly wobbled seam
136.5kph, cutting in towards the batsman, Watson defends it on the leg side
angled in towards middle and leg, tucked towards mid on this time
starts with a full delivery outside off, drives it down to long off
length delivery outside off and it's driven off the front foot to cover
stretches out and defends the length delivery to cover
fuller and angled in, glanced off the pads wide of fine leg for two
slightly full outside off, punched down t mid off off the front foot
too short and wide, Watson stays back and chops it over point in the air for a four to beat third man
bit of flight towards middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
he tries to sweep the delivery from leg but takes it on the pad
fullish on middle and leg, connects the sweep to fine short fine leg
makes a lot of room this time and punches it through the covers for one
straightish on middle stump, Watson defends it back
comes down the track and drives it to long off for one
full outside off and that's been driven back with some power for four. It was not a conventional drive, he whipped his wrists to send it past the bowler
low full toss outside off, pushed down to long off easily
back of length outside the off stump, he stays back to defend it
too full outside off, Finch launches it straight down the ground to the long on region for another aerial shot. One bounce four
back of length outside off, tapped wide of point and it's in the gap for two quick runs. Excellent running

in the air again, fall short of third man! It was a full delivery outside off, Finch drives in the air again, a leading edge goes high towards third man and there was nearly a misjudgement for the ball to slip through for four
full toss on middle, pushed down to long on for one
length delivery on off stump, leans forward to block it
goes on the back foot to push the length delivery to long off
full on middle stump, flicked away to deep midwicket
full on off, pushed delicately past the bowler to long on
flighted and loopy on leg stump, pushed to midwicket
short of length outside off, swatted towards deep point
short on middle and it's pulled to deep midwicket for one
too short this time and Watson pulls it for six! Watson had enough time to see the length and crash it wide of deep midwicket
slightly straighter and he defends it back
cutting in from outside off, pushed down to long off for one

slides it down the leg side, QDK attempts a stumping and he gets away for the wide. Looks like the stumping has been referred and replays show Finch's toe was well inside. "My decision is not out," says Billy Bowden, today's third umpire
slightly full and pushed down to long on
full on the stumps, driven down to long off
slower on the leg stump, it's slightly full and Watson sweeps it against the turn to beat short fine leg and deep backward for four
flighted on middle and leg, pushed down to long on
flighted on middle stump, slog-swept to deep midwicket in the air for one
goes on the back foot and pushes the shorter delivery from outside off to long on
too full on middle and leg, slogged on the leg side for one
full on the off stump and Finch crashes it to his favourite area for today - wide long on, and that's gone for six!
fullish on middle, pushed down to long on for one
short again outside off and that's pulled to deep midwicket for four more!
quicker on length outside off, chopped straight to point
just outside the off stump, pushed down to long off
back of length outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
short of length and angled in, tucked to deep square leg
swings it in from length outside off, Finch defends it back
138kph, length delivery, right on target, outside off and Finch defends it back
straighter towards middle stump, flicked away to deep midwicket for one more
back of length and swinging in again, eased down to long on for one
length delivery on the off stump, turned to the leg side for one
slower one on length around off, pushed down to long on
he's got Watson again! Behardien pitched it slightly shorter outside off, Watson slogged on the leg side but didn't get enough of it and long on went to his right to take the skier
full and slow around off, punched down to long off
fullish outside off, steers the ball to short third man
swing and a miss! It was well outside off, Smith reached out towards the ball to drive but could not connect
flat on the stumps, chopped on the off side
full and outside off, Finch makes room and steers it to sweeper cover
flighted on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
outside off now and it's pushed to cover off the front foot
full on the pads, flicked to the leg side for one
googly comes in sharply from outside off, swatted to deep midwicket for one and that's drinks
even wider outside off, driven to deep cover off the front foot
even wider outside off, driven off the front foot to deep cover
around length outside off, pushes it to cover
goes on the back foot for the slightly shorter delivery to tuck it to leg for one
on length outside off, drives it to cover
shorter and slower outside off, he waits for it and pushes it towards long on
full and flighted outside off, driven firmly but straight to cover
leans forward and defends the ball on off
makes room, the googly was shorter and Finch crunched it off the back foot through the square region on the off side for four
quicker on middle and leg, he makes room again and finds the gap again! Punched it with a drive past cover point and point, now on 99
full and pushed, misfield from Tahir and Finch gets his hundred. That's his fifth in ODI, comes from 117 balls and he's put on a strong platform for the middle order
comes down the track and flicks the ball towards square leg
too full and wide, Smith swings his arms to send it to sweeper cover for one
fullish on the off stump, pushed down to the bowler
slower at 103.6kph, eased down to long on for one
on length outside off, driven straight to cover
squares him up a bit as the ball somewhat stopped after pitching and he pushed it back to the bowler
on length outside off, tucked to the leg side to deep midwicket for one
stifled appeal for lbw as the ball cut in and hit him in front of leg but was going down
cutting in again towards the batsman, helped to short fine leg
short of length towards off and middle, pushed down to long off for one
fuller on off stump, eased down to long on and they come back for the second because long on thought that it was only one
outside off on length, he defends it back
sliding towards leg stump, flicked towards short fine leg where a dive saves a couple of runs
swinging in from off stump, helped to the leg side for one
back of length and outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
on length and just outside off, pushed towards midwicket
makes room, then shuffles across and whips it on the leg side flamingo style in the air to beat deep midwicket and he gets four
one more - this one was well outside off and third man was in, Smith tapped the ball late enough to beat the man in the circle and take four more
slower one at 109.6kph, jabs it to backward point for one
short of length outside off, tucked to midwicket
slower and fuller on middle and leg, he glances it delicately down the leg side for two in the gap before Tahit cuts it back
makes room and cuts the ball to deep backward point
shorter and slower outside off, dabs it to backward point for one more
angled in towards middle and leg, he makes room and slices it to short third man where Morkel dives to save some more runs
cuts it in a bit towards off stump, pushed back to the bowler
attempted swinging yorker on middle and leg, punched down to long on
full on off, Smith eyes the gap behind square on the leg side and whips it with the wrists to the leg side for four
slower at 113kph outside off, tapped towards point for one
full toss well outside off, steered to deep point for one
fullish well outside off, turned with the wrists to long on
too full and that's been driven firmly down the ground for two
shortish outside off, heaved to the leg side for one
AB's got the big wicket of Finch! Regular length delivery on the off stump, Finch went for a wild slog on the leg side and missed it completely. The ball crashed in to off and middle stumps
short of length towards the stumps, tucked to midwicket
outside off on short of length, taps it to short third man
back of length just outside off, swatted down to long on for one
short on the stumps, pulled to deep midwicket for one
swinging in from length outside off, pushed to cover
slower at 120kph on length outside off, taps it late to point
swinging in a bit at 136kph, pushed down to long on for one
back of length outside off, thick outside edge goes towards cover for one
fullish on the off stump, soft defence on the off side for a quick single
outside the off stump on back of length, dabs it down to third man for one. They considered the second but decided against him
angled into the batsman, flicked to the leg side for one
fullish on leg again, eased down to long on for one more
goes down on a knee to sweep the length ball from well outside off to backward square leg where a fumble gives them one
falls well short of long off as Bailey lofted the ball down the ground
comes down and digs the yorker out to the off side
slower at 100.8kph on the leg stump, tucked towards midwicket for one
back of length and angled in, tucked to the leg side for one
slower one at 115kph just outside off, chipped down the ground to long on and scramble back for the second, direct hit and Bailey was gone
shorter outside off, pushed back to the bowler
slower again at 117kph outside off, whipped to the leg side with the wrists again
fuller on the stumps and that's worked a bit wide of long on in the gap
one bounce to deep midwicket! Short delivery outside off and Bailey pulled it in the air, but straight to the fielder
yorker on the stumps, tapped towards backward point for one
full and angled in, he makes room and tucks it to square leg for one
that's a skier down the ground, it won't go all the way and Faf takes an easy catch! Bailey made room on the off side and lofted it high, didn't get much bat on the fullish delivery
attempted yorker goes down leg for a wide
low full toss outside off, eased down to long on for one
he made a bit of room, Morkel pitched it wide outside off, just inside the wide line
full and outside off, pushed down to long off
fullish on the stumps, worked between long on and deep midwicket in the gap
low full toss on off, struck down the ground as Behardien moved away and that bisected long on and long off for four
full on the leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket for one
short and wide at 111kph, Smith makes room and swats the ball over point for two
105kph, no pace again and well outside off again, sent down the ground to long on
fullish again, lofted in the air down to long on
yorker on the stumps, pushed down the ground to long on for two quick runs
full and wide outside off, Marsh swings his arms and finds the gap through the covers with a big drive to beat long off for four
full toss on leg stump, worked to deep midwicket and two more quick runs
yorker on the leg stump, pushed down to long and they scamper for two more, good running
hint of inswing outside off, nearly a yorker, driven on the off side
slower one at 122kph well outside off, Smith maybe expected that and went down on a knee to nearly sweep it to the fine leg boundary for four
fullish on off stump, he wanted to loft it straight down the ground but didn't get enough and managed it over the bowler's head for two

he's played the wrong line and lofted it high for an easy catch to AB at long off! It was angled in a bit towards middle and leg, but he lofted it inside out, very high and AB took it with rather ease
goes across and whips the ball to fine leg as it was pitched up and that's his fifty
full delivery well outside off, tapped to backward point for one
full and angled away, steered to sweeper cover off the front foot for one
super shot, he'll get four for that! It was pitched up outside off, Smith middled that as he nearly went down on a knee and smacked it to the boundary with a glorious drive
fullish and wide outside off, he drives hard and gets a run to third man
he makes room, Steyn pitches it short and Smith pulls it to deep midwicket
close to off stump on length, Wade tries to work it on off but misses
charges down to swat it on off but gets a bottom edge for a quick single
inswinging yorker around off, Smith goes back in the crease and whips it again with the wrists to beat fine leg for four
low full toss outside off, Smith tries to work it on leg but misses
angled across the off stump, Wade comes down to slog it on the leg side but gets an inside edge past the stumps on the leg side and they run well for three
that's gone high, that's going for six, but it's been pulled back by Faf as he jumped back from long on at the boundary, got a hand to it in the air and kept the ball inside. Outstanding effort!
full toss this time outside leg and Smith whips it to the fine leg boundary for four this time
full again, it's lofted down the ground and Faf runs in from long on to take a great catch with his right hand, celebrates too but it's a no ball
shuffles across off and stays in the crease, whips the full ball with the wrists in between his legs to the leg side for four! He's played this shot too often today
outside off, he pokes it to point for one
short of length outside off, swishes it to cover where Miller dives to save a couple of runs

inn2.comm: outside the off stump, runs it down to third man for one
outside off on length, pushed on the off side
outside off on length, QDK pushes it back
width on the off side and WDK caresses it along the ground through covers. They ran two easily and there was a mix up for the third, but they reached eventually
length delivery outside the off stump, driven to cover point
cuts it uppishly form outside off, the ball flies away to third man after a couple of bounces
stays a bit low as it swings away from length outside off and goes under Amla's bat as he pushed at it
too wide this time, was short too and Amla punched it off the back foot through the point region for a cracking four
length delivery on off stump this time, Amla defends it back
fuller on the off stump, no room at all and Amla pushes it back again
bit too wide again and Amla is not going to let it go, drives it beautifully through the covers this time for four
fullish close to off stump, pushed on the off side
brings it in towards off stump, QDK defends it back
angled in further towards leg side, goes off the pad towards midwicket and QDK screams "no" because Amla wanted a run but was sent back
145kph, straight delivery on the stumps, QDK defends to short midwicket
too short and QDK pulls it late to send it fine down the leg side for four. Fine leg in the circle and QDK does well to beat him
fullish outside off and it's pushed into the covers. No ball for overstepping
147.3kph, right in the block hole, the stumps have gone all over as QDK made room to slog. Starc smiles and goes back to his run up
angled in towards middle and leg, tucked to the leg side
full and angled into the pads, Amla absolutely middles that and sends it crashing on the leg side with a flick for four
short this time, Amla pulls and it goes over midwicket for two runs, could have been three
on length outside off, Amla swings and misses as the ball nipped in after pitching
back of length outside off, Amla goes back to defend it on off
fuller outside off, punched off the back foot to point
141kph, brings in the back of length delivery and Amla defends again
length delivery outside off, slices it to cover point
on length on the off stump, QDK defends it back to the bowler
145.3kph, full and swinging in from outside off, blocked back to the bowler
full on the stumps this time, pushed down gently towards mid on
further towards the leg side, flicked to deep midwicket off the pads
too full on the pads and that's flicked in the air for four to the midwicket boundary
angled across outside off, QDK leans forward and blocks it
touch fuller outside off, pushed down to mid off
139.6kph, outside off with the angle again, driven into the covers
bangs in the short ball with cross seam, QDK looked to pull initially but it bounced too much and beat him by pace
on length around off with the angle, tucked to midwicket and there's an unnecessary overthrow to give them one
too full on the pads, that's a poor delivery and Amla flicks it again with his wrists for four. This time to the fine leg boundary
124kph, length delivery outside off chopped to third man for one
back of length just outside off, worked off the back foot with the wrists to the leg side
120.5kph, towards the off stump, QDK has enough time to go back and whip it on the leg side for two
fuller outside off, pushed down softly towards mid off for one
back of length outside the off stump, dabs it to point off the back foot
appeal for lbw as the ball came in from outside off but it hit him pretty high in front of the stumps
back of length and coming in, worked on the leg side off the back foot in the gap
fuller on the stumps, drives it down to mid on
goes shorter again, QDK stays back and works it past midwicket for two more
he's been bowling too short, this time QDK waits for it and flicked it from around off to the fine leg boundary for four
touch wider of off, similar length and QDK works it to deep square leg again
shortish outside off, Amla taps it off the back foot wide of point for one
on length towards off and middle, flicked to deep midwicket for an easy one
just over short cover! It was angled across a bit from off, QDK wants to work it to leg but played it early and a leading edge went over short cover for one
outside off and it's pushed down to mid off
short ball, it's pulled and falls well short of short fine leg
he gets room and punches it off the back foot through the off side for four! Stayed on the back foot and caressed it between point and cover point
short of length outside off, dabbed towards point
back of length outside the off stump, he defends it off the back foot
138.7kph, touch fuller outside off, pushed into the covers
length delivery coming in from outside off, he drives and a thick inside edge goes to deep midwicket for two
back to back of length, square-drives it late to point
width on offer and Amla drives it beautifully through the covers. It was not a powerful drive, but he timed it so well it went all the way for four
edged and doesn't carry! Outside off, Amla pushes but it keeps low and takes a bottom edge
fullish on off stump, worked with the turn to midwicket
touch shorter and it's pushed to the leg side again
outside off and it's reverse swept to backward point
shorter delivery outside off, chopped off the back foot to sweeper cover
flighted on middle, driven down to long off for one
full and flighted on the off stump, driven down to long on
slightly short and angled across, pulled to midwicket
charges down this time and smacks it in the air on the leg side by taking it on the full. Four runs as there's nobody in the deep
on the pads now and flicked to deep backward square leg for one
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
fuller outside the off stump and it's driven through the covers for one
too short and QDK picks the short boundary at fine leg for six! Short outside the leg stump, QDK rocked back and smacked it high over fine leg
touch short outside off, chopped to point
full on the pads, eased to deep midwicket for one
on length outside off and turning in, QDK leans forward and works it to leg with the spin
shorter and flatter outside off, enough room and time for Amla to cut it past point for four! Great timing to beat the off side fielders
fuller on the stumps, pushed down to long on for one
turns it in nicely from well outside off, QDK goes on the back foot and cuts it towards point
full on the stumps, driven down to mid on
full on the pads, clipped in the air to deep midwicket with the wrists
full outside the off stump, pushed down to mid off
makes room by going to the leg side and swishes at the ball to clear cover, but he got a hand to it
swings and misses! Didn't move his feet much for the widish delivery outside off, he chased and didn't connect
short ball outside off, pulled with some power to deep midwicket for one
flighted on the off stump, drives it down to long off
takes a step down and works the ball to long on
loopy and full on middle again, pushed to short cover this time
bit of flight outside off, Amla frees his arms with a drive to sweeper cover and that's his fifty
flighted and full well outside off, tries the reverse sweep and is hit on the back foot
the orthodox sweep is much better and he gets for four that. Went down on a knee and played it with the spin to beat a running fine leg fielder in the deep
short ball angled in towards Amla, pulls it off the back foot to fine leg
full toss on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one
full on the stumps, taps it close to the pitch on off for a quick single
drives it outside off without much footwork and the inside edge rolls down to leg
slower and fuller at 119.2kph, he taps it to point
angled in towards the batsman, worked to deep midwicket for one
comes down the track and pushes the ball to long on, and that's SA's 100
turning in from outside off, takes a step down to work it to leg and a fumble at midwicket from Smith concedes a single
straight on middle, Amla defends it back
touch shorter outside off, whipped off the back foot to leg
flatter and quicker outside off, he gets an inside edge while trying to cut it
comes down and takes it on the full to drive it to cover
angled into the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one
slower at 125kph outside off, taps it towards short cover point for one
127.3kph, eased to deep midwicket with the angle for one
113kph, slower and lower from the leg side, QDK pulls it to the leg side
118kph, angled towards the stump, worked to the leg side for one more
130kph, fuller on the off stump, pushed back uppishly to the bowler. Time for some drinks
length delivery outside the off stump, tapped towards third man for one

doesn't connect the pull well and a leading edge goes high, caught around short third man! QDK pulled the short delivery from leg but got a top edge which went very high and Marsh had to run back from backward point for the catch
cutting in from outside off, Amla blocks it back
shorter outside off, dabs it late to point
on length wider outside off, punched off the back foot to point
goes back and works it on the leg side for one
angled in from off, worked off the pads behind square on the leg side
back of length outside off, square driven to deep point for one
waits in the crease and flicks the ball to deep square leg for one
on length now outside off, Faf defends it on the off side
slower at 120.5kph and full on the stumps, driven to mid on for one
112.6kph, fullish and wide, driven away from the body to sweeper cover
fullish outside off, driven down to long off for one
angled in towards middle and leg, worked to midwicket
takes a step down and flicks the delivery on leg
flatter on the stumps, pushes it back to the bowler
slower on length around off stump, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
bit shorter outside off, pushed to cover
back of length outside off, steered off the back foot to deep backward point
takes a step down, Marsh tries a yorker but it's a low full toss on the pads and he flicks it away behind square on the leg side for four
130koh, that keeps low after pitching on length outside off as Faf tried to slice it
117.6kph, cuts in the slower ball from around off, clipped to the leg side for one
slow offcutter again, Amla defends it off the back foot
firm drive off the low full toss on off, Marsh gets a hand to it and saves a few
comes down the track, takes it on the full and whips it from middle stump to find the gap between deep midwicket and long on for four
fuller on the stumps, pushes it back to Doherty
shorter on the stumps, worked off the back foot to leg
comes down and pushes the length delivery to cover
shorter and much wider, punched off the back foot and Finch runs to his left fro sweeper cover to cut it to two
back in the crease and works the ball to leg for one
fullish outside off, driven straight to short cover
cuts it in a bit from outside off, pushed down to mid off for a quick single
short delivery just outside off, pulled to deep midwicket for one
too full and outside off, driven firmly, but straight to short cover
touch wider outside off, driven nicely along the ground to sweeper cover for one
shorter and outside off, pushed down to long off for one
keeps low after pitching on short of length, pushed to cover
angled into the batsman, worked to fine leg off the pads for one
fullish outside off, Amla drives it off the front foot to mid off
much shorter towards off stump, pulled to square leg for one
tries to work the ball to leg off the back foot and gets an inside edge onto the front thigh pad for one
touch fuller and it's steered to the leg side for one more
short of length outside off, taps it to backward point
stifled appeal as Amla is struck towards the leg side but it's going down
shorter outside off, slices it off the back foot to deep backward point for one
another lbw appeal, the umpire says no again! It came in sharply from outside off, Faf went back and on his toes and the ball was mising leg for sure
short ball outside off, runs it down to third man for an easy single
he looks to pull the ball from off, but misses
shortish outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
fuller on the stumps, it's flicked to deep square leg for one
keeps a bit low, it was well wide outside off and Faf pushes it to cover point
Faf holes out! He came down the track, Marsh pitched it short, and Faf pulled it powerfully but found the fielder in the deep who didn't have to move much for the catch
full and down leg past the batsman for a wide
length delivery on middle stump, steered to midwicket
full toss on the pads, flicked to deep backward square for one. No time for the second
angled in towards the stumps, flicked to leg for one
full outside off, pushed down to mid on
hint of inswing  as the ball comes in, he defends it back
fullish outside the off stump, pushed into the covers
inside edge off the drive goes past the stumps to fine leg
edged and taken outside off! Rossouw didn't move his feet much for the length delivery outside off, and drove and merely edged it to Wade for an easy catch
cuts it in from back of length outside off, Amla defends it on off
much fuller and wider outside off, driven firmly through the covers for one
stifled appeal first ball as the ball comes in shsrply from just outside off but it struck him outside leg and was going down further
well outside off now and that's swished to sweeper cover to get off the mark
back of length outside off, chops it late to short cover
angled in this time towards middle and leg, pushed down the ground on the leg side
comes down the track and swings his arms to drive it to cover
he charges down again, mid off is in, and he clears the fielder with a powerful hit down the ground for four
shuffles across and drives the length delivery to cover
shorter outside the off stump, pushed off the back foot to off for one
angled in and it's worked off the pads towards midwicket
length delivery outside off, AB can't clear cover
slow and well outside off, Amla has enough time to drive it beautifully through the covers for four
goes on the back foot and works it towards deep backward square leg for two
outside off and it's punched to cover
116kph, slow and straight on the stumps, he defends it back
chips it down the ground, doesn't middle it but he connects well to clear mid on and Doherty slides near the boundary to save a run
length delivery is straight on the stumps and he defends it back
shapes it in from outside off towards the stumps, Amla defends it back
falls short of mid off! Amla drove it down the ground, but it was a slower one. Starc came in but it was out of his reach
bit too full outside off, driven firmly through the covers and Warner runs fro sweeper cover to slide and save it
fullish towards leg now and it's lofted to the wide long on boundary in the gap for two more
touch short of length around off, worked off the back foot to fine leg for one
AB moves across to sweep the pace bowler, misses, and is struck outside off as the bowler appeals. There was an inside edge too
113kph, slower and pretty full outside off, AB drives it in the air through the covers for four!
charges down and smacks the delivery to long off
full outside off, driven down towards mid off for one
angles it in towards middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
shuffles across and whips it away to the wide long on boundary for four! It was on back of length, he went back in the crease and used his wrists to turn it to leg
that's a six to end the over! He went down on a knee and swept the delivery to the fine leg region for six! Time for drinks
back of length outside off, taps it to backward point
short of length outside off, pushed down the ground to mid on
goes back and across a bit and pushes the ball down to mid on
comes down this time and drives it down to long on for one
back of length and cutting in towards the stumps, inside edge gets him a single
shorter and coming in, pulled to square leg for one
makes room for the short delivery and slaps it down the ground to long off
length delivery outside off, Amla doesn't move much and swishes it to deep cover
full and outside off, AB goes for a full swing of his arms and gets a leading edge over point and gets four. Nobody in the deep there
shuffles across this time, goes down on a knee for the shorter delivery and paddles it fine down the leg side for another four!
three in a row! Drives the length delivery outside off and he guides the ball uppishly between shortf third man and backward point for four
straighter delivery and whips it this time wide of fine leg for two in the gap
outside off, Amla slices it to short third man and if Hazlewood got a direct hit at the keeper's end, AB might have been in danger, very close!
angled into AB who clips it in the gap towards fine leg for an easy two
charges down the track, Richardson pitches it short and AB slaps it to deep midwicket
full outside off, Amla smacks it down to mid off for another quick single. Starc tried a run out at bowler's end but Amla made it
full toss on the pads, steered to the leg side for two more
whips the full ball with the wrists wide of deep midwicket but Smith runs quickly and gets there to keep it to one
short ball around off, slapped powerfully to deep midwicket again and they come back for the second quickly
full and wide, he makes room and drives it to cover point at the edge of the circle
stays back for the back of length ball and pulls it to the leg side. 50 for AB off just 32 deliveries
swing and a miss! Amla drove well outside off without any footwork and just missed the outside edge!
short ball and that's pulled to deep midwicket. That's his hundred, he takes the helmet off, acknowledges the crowd and gets a hug from AB
dropped, but it was a very tough chance! AB pulled the ball again, it was dipping on mid on where Marsh came in to catch but it was very low on his right side
back of length outside the off stump, tapped to backward point for one

that's a loud appeal for lbw, umpire says it's out and AB reviews it! Bowden says there's nothing on Hot Spot, it's hitting him in line and is hitting the stumps too, AB has to go. AB had moved across a long way to the off side to slog the delivery on leg, missed it and was struck just in front of off
back of length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
angled in this time towards leg, clipped to backward square leg for one
outside the off stump on length, steered to backward point
slogs it on the leg side in the air with the angle and it falls well short of deep midwicket
one more, Amla's gone too! He made a bit of room for the straighter ball that was coming in, he missed the line of the ball and slogged to leg, and was clean bowled!
beaten first ball! Short of length outside off with the angle, Miller is struck to his crease and pokes, and misses
pitched up on the pads now, clipped away to leg for one
angled in towards the pads, tucked to backward square leg for one
fuller on the stumps, Miller pushes it back and sets off, Hazlewood stops with is left hand, switches the ball to right and throws it back, the ball hits Miller on the way who dives in
fuller this time and it's whipped on the leg side for one
short of length outside off, sliced off the back foot on the off side
fullish and well outside off, driven through the covers for one

inswinging yorker does it, the finger goes up! Miller was struck on the crease as the yorker dipped and swung in, hit him on the front shoe in front of leg stump, was it going down leg? The umpire says it's out and Miller has a few words with the huddle that's forming
angled in from round the wicket, he defends it back
length delivery angled in towards the stumps, pushes it back again
wider outside the off stump, steered to deep point for one
cuts it in from outside off, Philander defends it back
bangs in the bouncer outside off and it's too short, called a wide
back of length outside off, pushes it on off and gets an inside edge onto his pads
on length outside the off stump, pushes it down to mid off
fuller on the stumps, tucked straight to midwicket
full on the stumps, defends it back to the bowler
shorter outside off, pulled to midwicket and not a single run off the bat in this over
that's beautifully driven in the air and over the covers for four! It was pretty wide and he stretched out for the ball to drive it firmly
angled in this time and defends it back to Starc
low full toss well outside off, thick edge rolls down to third man for one
makes some room and drives the full delivery down to mid off
bangs i the bouncer towards the leg side, not given a wide
pulled, that's high in the air and it's an easy catch for Finch! Philander pulled the short ball, it went high and Finch took a few steps in from midwicket for the catch
hops back in the crease for the incoming delivery and pushes it to mid on for one
slightly full and wide, Steyn swings his arms to drive it to mid off
makes room to pull the short ball but sways out of the line
makes room again for the short delivery and slaps it down the ground over mid on for four
another one, no that goes all the way! Made room on the leg side, it was a straight delivery and he smacked it down the ground for a clean six
full on the pads, driven down wide of long on in the gap for two. There's a direct hit at the bowler's end, it's gone to the third umpire and he's home easily
shuffles across to the off side to scoop the ball behind square on leg and gets an inside edge on the pads. Umpire says it's a leg bye
taken at mid off, one more falls! Steyn had been targeting the region down the ground, he didn't connect that well and was caught by Marsh at mid off
inswinging yorker towards middle and leg, the bat comes down just in time to block and the ball misses the stumps by a whisker!
outside the off stump on length, Morkel swings and misses
fuller and wider, pushed to point off the front foot
inswinging low full toss just outside off, steered to deep cover for one
slogged on the leg side for four! It was fullish on the leg side and Behardien smacked it wide of deep midwicket for four
short ball outside off, he waits for it for the ramp shot but misses
gone, one more caught at mid off! He made room for the delivery to clear mid off, lofted it in the air and Finch took an easy catch
